review: It's an affordable, well-designed, compact streaming device for watching your favorite programs on your wi-fi devices.  You must subscribe to Netflix, HBO, SHO, Amazon Prime or other similar services to watch quality videos or movies.  I am dissappointed with the quality of Amazon Prime offering of videos and movies.

review: Great product when close to the router.  I bought this for my bedroom TV, which is 18 steps from the router(20-25 feet in a straight line).  It was able to download its update, but does not have a good enough signal strength to stream.  I tested my ChromeCast on the same TV, and it worked fine.  If they can improve the wifi strength on this, I would give this 5 stars.  Love the control and the menus.
author: Michael Wiley

review: Wanted something to put in the bedroom to replace an older failing Smart Blu-Ray player. Has everything I wanted and more. Streams without lag or pixel artifacts. So far no issues. Wife and Daughter are happy. Will update later if needed.
